meanings.definition: To deposit or dispose of (garbage, waste, etc.) in a careless or indiscriminate manner.
meanings.sent1: I dumped the trash behind the house.
meanings.sent2: She dumped the old papers into the recycling bin.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon dumped the leftovers all over the yard.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing bin dumped its contents onto the floor.
meanings.sent5: The careless hiker dumped banana peels along the trail.

meanings.definition: To end a romantic relationship abruptly and without warning.
meanings.sent1: He dumped his girlfriend over text.
meanings.sent2: She felt heartbroken when he dumped her.
meanings.sent3: The soap opera character dumped his partner for a llama.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it had been dumped into a cold river.
meanings.sent5: The breakup scene in the movie was like a truck hitting a wall.

meanings.definition: To unload or empty out (a container or contents) quickly and all at once.
meanings.sent1: The workers dumped the boxes off the truck.
meanings.sent2: He dumped the sand out of his shoes.
meanings.sent3: The magician dumped a pile of confetti on the audience.
meanings.sent4: The storm dumped rain on the city streets.
meanings.sent5: The truck dumped a load of gravel onto the construction site.
